task.title: TASK 1: Prepare the Device for Operation

ul.li: Cool Creations ICE-60W Ice Cream Maker

context.p:
Instructions:
Electricity Warning AVOID SUBMERGING THE MOTOR BASE OF THE MACHINE IN WATER, IT CONTAINS A ELECTRICAL MOTOR THAT COULD RESULT IN FIRE IF EXPOSED TO WATER

step.cmd: COLLECT a medium sized bowl filled with warm, soapy water
WASH the freezer bowl, lid and mixing arm in the prepared water
REMOVE any visible dust, residue, or leftover ingredients from the inside of the machine
PLACE freezer bowl inside of the freezer overnight, or for a minimum of 8 hours
PLUG the unit into a traditional outlet using the attached power chord
